original_text: They will give you strength in life. You will enjoy life, like a beautiful necklace that you wear.
korean_text: 그리하면 그것이 네 영혼의 생명이 되며 네 목에 장식이 되리니

sentences.original_text: They will give you strength in life
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신에게 삶에서 힘을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: like a beautiful necklace that you wear
